item.title: 日本央行在沟通上的 "变脸 "可能会影响未来的利率走势
item.description: 日本央行在本周的全球市场动荡中设法平息了投资者的紧张情绪，扭转了宣传稳步升息的校准策略，但这一反转考验了该行逐步取消数十年激进刺激政策的决心。【原文：The Bank of Japan managed to calm investor nerves during global market turmoil this week by reversing a calibrated strategy to communicate steady interest-rate rises, but the flip-flop tests the bank's resolve to phase out decades of radical stimulus.】

item.title: 受航空和国防市场推动，Viasat 上调 2025 财年收入预期
item.description: Viasat 周三上调了 2025 财年的收入预期，表明航空和国防市场对这家卫星通信公司的连接解决方案的需求激增。【原文：Viasat raised its fiscal year 2025 revenue forecast on Wednesday, indicating a surge in demand for the satellite communications company's connectivity solutions from the aviation and defense markets.】

item.title: 科技股拖累欧洲股市
item.description: 欧洲股市周四开盘走低，与亚洲市场的低迷情绪如出一辙，科技股拖累了基准股指，尽管一系列乐观的企业最新消息抑制了损失。【原文：European shares opened lower on Thursday, mirroring the downbeat mood in Asian markets, as tech stocks weighed on the benchmark, although a raft of upbeat corporate updates kept losses in check.】

item.title: 高盛称，市场最糟糕的下跌可能已经结束，但仍需抓紧时间
item.description: 高盛对冲基金全球主管托尼-帕斯夸瑞洛（Tony Pasquariello）表示，在全球市场经历了动荡的一周之后，最糟糕的抛售可能已经过去，但投资者 "目前需要对大的方向性押注保持谨慎"。【原文：After a turbulent week in global markets, the worst of the selloff might be over but investors need to "keep the reins tight on big directional bets for now," Goldman Sachs global head of hedge fund coverage Tony Pasquariello said.】

item.title: 新加坡星展银行即将上任的首席执行官陈素珊是谁？
item.description: 新加坡星展集团已任命现任机构银行集团主管陈素珊从 3 月起担任首席执行官，接替领导东南亚最大银行长达 14 年之久的 Piyush Gupta。【原文：Singapore's DBS Group has appointed Tan Su Shan, currently its institutional banking group head, as CEO from March, replacing Piyush Gupta, who has led Southeast Asia's biggest bank for 14 years.】

item.title: 欧洲航运公司将美国政治和中国经济列为影响航运发展势头的风险因素
item.description: 比利时油轮公司欧洲航运公司（Euronav）预计，受红海航运改道的推动，今年全球海上贸易量将有所增加，但该公司表示，美国总统换届和中国经济放缓是关键的风险因素。【原文：Belgian oil tanker company Euronav expects global sea trade to increase this year, driven by the rerouting of Red Sea shipping, but said a change in the U.S. presidency and a slowdown in China's economy are key risk factors.】

item.title: 美国取代中国成为德国最大贸易伙伴
item.description: 根据德国统计局的初步数据，2024 年上半年，美国将超过中国成为德国最大的贸易伙伴。【原文：The United States overtook China as Germany's biggest trading partner in the first half of 2024, according to preliminary German statistics office data, as Berlin's drive to reduce dependency on Beijing takes shape amid a resilient U.S. economy.】

item.title: 德国订单推动莱茵金属上半年积压订单强劲增长
item.description: 德国莱茵金属防务集团（Rheinmetall）周四表示，由于来自德国和援助乌克兰的订单大幅增加，该公司前六个月的积压订单大幅增加。【原文：German defence group Rheinmetall said on Thursday that its backlog rose significantly in the first six months due to a strong rise in orders from Germany and for the aid of Ukraine.】

item.title: 美联储宽松押注和利差交易平仓令分析师看涨亚洲货币
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，受美联储降息预期升温和日元套息交易平仓的推动，分析师一年多来首次转而看涨大多数主要亚洲货币。【原文：Analysts have turned bullish on most major Asian currencies for the first time in more than a year, bolstered by rising bets of interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve and an unwinding of yen-funded carry trades, a Reuters poll found.】

item.title: 投资者感受到消费者节俭对公司利润的影响
item.description: 大型消费品公司的投资者不得不提高他们的选股能力，因为疫情过后的消费热潮逐渐减退，对价格越来越敏感的购物者开始削弱公司的定价能力。【原文：Investors in large consumer-goods companies are having to up their stock-picking game, as a post-pandemic spending splurge dries up and increasingly price-sensitive shoppers start to erode corporate pricing power.】

item.title: 受益于电气化和软件，西门子季度利润超出市场预期
item.description: 受客户升级电力基础设施和生产软件需求的推动，德国工业齿轮制造商西门子 4-6 月份的盈利增长好于预期。【原文：German industrial gear maker Siemens posted better-than-expected earnings growth during the April-to-June quarter, buoyed by customers who are upgrading their electricity infrastructure and by demand for production software.】

item.title: 独家报道：西方保险公司不顾价格上限担忧为俄罗斯石油提供保险
item.description: 来自贸易商和托运人的数据显示，在许多贸易界人士因担心违反七国集团的价格上限规则而退出后，一批西方保险公司为运载俄罗斯原油的油轮提供了保险，使俄罗斯的石油得以继续流通。【原文：A group of Western insurers have provided cover for tankers carrying Russian crude, keeping its oil flowing after many in the trade sector withdrew for fear of breaching the rules of a G7 price cap, data from traders and shippers shows.】

item.title: 美国科技股暴跌吸引部分买家勇敢面对坎坷市场
item.description: 在美国科技股大幅下挫之后，投资者正蹑手蹑脚地重回股市，尽管一些估值仍然偏高的股票有可能在市场再次跌宕起伏时惩罚逢低买入者。【原文：Investors are tiptoeing back into shares of U.S. tech stocks following a sharp tumble, even as some still-elevated valuations threaten to punish dip buyers if markets stumble again.】

item.title: 早间竞价波动不减
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 泰国批准汽车零部件合资企业激励措施
item.description: 泰国投资委员会周四表示，泰国已批准激励措施，鼓励泰国公司与外国公司成立合资企业（JV），为使用各种推进系统的车辆生产汽车零部件。【原文：Thailand has approved incentives for joint ventures (JV) between Thai and foreign companies to manufacture automotive parts for vehicles using all types of propulsion systems, its Board of Investment said on Thursday.】

item.title: 名爵汽车将在墨西哥建造制造工厂和研发中心
item.description: 名爵汽车公司（MG Motor）周三表示，该公司计划在墨西哥建造一座生产厂和一个研发中心。【原文：MG Motor plans to build a manufacturing plant and a research and development center in Mexico, the carmaker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 媒体报道：火灾发生后，韩国将要求电动汽车制造商公布电池品牌
item.description: 据一家报纸周四报道，韩国计划要求电动汽车（EV）制造商公布汽车电池的品牌，因为地下停车场的一辆汽车起火，造成了巨大损失，这引起了人们对安全问题的关注。【原文：South Korea plans to require electric vehicle (EV) makers to disclose the brand of batteries in cars due to safety concerns after a vehicle in an underground parking lot caught fire, causing extensive damage, a newspaper reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 日本资生堂成为受中国市场下滑影响的最新奢侈品牌，股价暴跌
item.description: 日本化妆品巨头资生堂周四在东京交易市场下跌，跌幅达到每日上限，原因是年中盈利受到重组成本和中国需求下滑的影响。【原文：Japanese cosmetics powerhouse Shiseido fell by its daily limit in Tokyo trading on Thursday following midyear earnings that were hit by restructuring costs and slumping demand in China.】

item.title: 科技股领跌亚洲股市，本周市场波动日元上涨
item.description: 科技股领跌亚洲股市，而日元和美国公债则出现反弹，全球投资者在市场不景气的一周里努力寻找自己的立足点。【原文：Tech shares led a selloff in stock markets around Asia, while the yen and U.S. bonds rebounded, as global investors struggled to find their footing in a wild week for markets.】

item.title: 交易员评估日本利率走势，日元在大幅下跌后走强
item.description: 本周日元汇率波动剧烈，投资者权衡热门套利交易的平仓情况，并思考日本央行可能采取的利率路径，日元在前一交易日大幅下跌后于周四走强。【原文：The yen firmed on Thursday after a sharp drop in the previous session in a volatile week that has left sentiment fragile as investors weigh the unwinding of popular carry trades and ponder the rate path Japan's central bank is likely to take.】

item.title: 瑞波因不当销售 XRP 代币被勒令支付 1.25 亿美元罚金
item.description: 根据一份法庭文件，曼哈顿法院法官已下令瑞波实验室（Ripple Labs）向美国证券交易委员会支付约 1.25 亿美元的罚款，原因是被指控不当销售加密货币 XRP。【原文：Ripple Labs has been ordered by a Manhattan court judge to pay the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission about $125 million in penalties over charges of improperly selling the cryptocurrency XRP, according to a court filing.】

item.title: 油价因美国原油库存大幅下降而上扬
item.description: 在政府数据显示美国原油库存大幅减少后，油价周四连续第三个交易日走高，从本周触及的数月低点反弹。【原文：Oil prices edged higher on Thursday for the third straight session after government data showed a steep draw in U.S. crude stockpiles, rebounding from multi-month lows touched this week.】

item.title: 随着机器人出租车和乘客的增多，中国的司机们开始焦虑了
item.description: 刘毅是中国 700 万顺风车司机中的一员。他今年 36 岁，是武汉市居民，由于全国未售出的公寓过剩，建筑工程放缓，他开始兼职开车。【原文：Liu Yi is among China's 7 million ride-hailing drivers. A 36-year-old Wuhan resident, he started driving part-time this year when construction work slowed in the face of a nationwide glut of unsold apartments.】

item.title: 中部经济报》报道：丰田将 2024 年全球汽车产量预期下调 5
item.description: 据日本中部经济新闻周四报道，由于国内工厂停产，丰田汽车公司已将其2024日历年的全球汽车生产计划下调了约5%。【原文：Toyota Motor has downgraded its global vehicle production plan for the calendar year 2024 by about 5% due to output suspension at domestic factories, Chubu Keizai newspaper reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 澳航董事会决定削减前首席执行官艾伦-乔伊斯 2023 年的薪酬
item.description: 澳洲航空公司（Qantas Airways）周四表示，董事会已决定将前首席执行官艾伦-乔伊斯（Alan Joyce）2023 财年的薪酬削减 926 万澳元（603 万美元）。【原文：Qantas Airways said on Thursday its board had decided to cut former CEO Alan Joyce's fiscal 2023 pay by A$9.26 million ($6.03 million).】

item.title: 巴西 LATAM 航空公司负责人表示，该公司可能增加较小的巴西航空工业公司和空中客车飞机
item.description: 拉美航空（LATAM Airlines）巴西负责人周三表示，该公司正在权衡为其机队增加巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）的 E2 和空中客车公司（Airbus）的 A220 等小型飞机的可能性。【原文：LATAM Airlines is weighing the possibility of adding smaller aircraft to its fleet such as Embraer's E2 and Airbus' A220, the firm's Brazil head said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 巴西银行第二季度调整后利润增长 8
item.description: 国有控股银行巴西银行（Banco do Brasil）周三公布，其第二季度调整后净利润同比增长 8.2%。【原文：State-controlled lender Banco do Brasil reported on Wednesday 8.2% year-on-year growth in its second-quarter adjusted net profit.】

item.title: 怪物饮料因经济担忧导致需求放缓，季度销售额未达预期
item.description: 怪兽饮料公司（Monster Beverage）周三公布的第二季度销售额低于市场预期，原因是预算意识较强的消费者紧缩开支，在经济环境不确定的情况下损害了对其价格昂贵的能量饮料的需求。【原文：Monster Beverage missed market expectations for second-quarter sales on Wednesday as budget-conscious consumers kept a tight lid on spending, hurting demand for its pricey energy drinks amid an uncertain economic environment.】

item.title: 沃尔格林探索 VillageMD 业务的各种选择
item.description: 沃尔格林博姿联盟（Walgreens Boots Alliance）周三表示，正在探索包括出售 VillageMD 业务在内的各种选择。【原文：Walgreens Boots Alliance said on Wednesday it was exploring options, including a sale, for its VillageMD business.】

item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】
